forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 8am. Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
Overnight, the city has donned its cloak of clouds, with a gentle drizzle whispering through the streets, creating a misty veil that softens the world in shades of gray. As the sun rises, this morning's moisture hangs slightly in the air, veiling the skyline and contributing to a cool embrace, with temperatures hovering around 57 degrees. The west winds carry a briskness, stirring the heart of the city as they dance between buildings, a prelude to the warmth the day may bring.

By midday, the forecast promises an awakening; the clouds will yield to bright, welcoming sunshine that illuminates the iconic skyline. As the sun carves its path through the clouds, expect temperatures to peak around the mid-60s, making it a delightful day to explore. Though the chances of drizzle remain low, the lingering marine layer may keep the air cool and crisp, especially near the bay. Dress comfortably in layers—perhaps a light sweater or jacket to fend off the morning chill, transitioning easily to an open collar in the afternoon warmth. As the city breathes in this fresh, cornflower blue afternoon, one might relish the simple joy of a stroll through Golden Gate Park or enjoy a cup of coffee at an outdoor café, soaking in the vibrant life that ebbs and flows through the heart of Downtown San Francisco.
